channel.title: Researches on Jonathan Tollefson
channel.description: Recent content in Researches on Jonathan Tollefson

item.title: FMGP methods
item.description: Detecting FMGP sites with OpenCV →Frickel, S. and Tollefson, J. (2021, under review) →Tollefson, J., Frickel, S. and Restrepo, I. (2021, in preparation) This is a project to detect former manufactured gas plants (FMGP) using OpenCV freeware (http://opencv.org) to pass candidate map regions to a convolutional neural network (CNN) trained to identify the circular gasometer structures that signify MGPs and district gasometers. Our “Detect_MGP” approach reduces the time required to manually code map images by up to 90%, with a recall rate of approximately 85-90%.
